channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: SMES ON THE RISE 2025
channel.desc: A project for overseas expansion of the local SMEs Suwon city government providing active support for the promising local businesses In 2022, Suwon city was designated as Suwon Special Metropolitan City. As an economic city, it has actively promoted the products that have been manufactured by the local SMEs to overseas markets. And it has made utmost effort to help the local SMEs achieve overseas sales expansion and increase export. Together with Peter Bint, ?SMEs on the rise? introduces the advanced technological capabilities of SMEs and their products. We explore the premium items of the local SMEs in diversified areas including daily necessities, sanitary products, electronic devices, food, iris identification and molecular diagnosis as well as their ongoing effort for continuous growth.
